statements: SELECT * FROM reminders
SELECT reminder_description, task_deadline FROM reminders WHERE is_completed = true
SELECT reminder_id, reminder_description FROM reminders ORDER BY task_deadline DESC
SELECT * FROM reminders WHERE task_deadline BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30'
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_reminders FROM reminders WHERE is_completed = false
SELECT reminder_description, task_deadline FROM reminders WHERE is_completed = false ORDER BY task_deadline DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM reminders WHERE reminder_description ILIKE '%urgent%' OR is_completed = true ORDER BY task_deadline ASC;
SELECT reminder_id, reminder_description, task_deadline FROM reminders WHERE task_deadline >= NOW() AND task_deadline <= NOW() + INTERVAL '1 week' ORDER BY task_deadline ASC;
SELECT reminder_description, is_completed FROM reminders WHERE task_deadline < NOW() AND is_completed = false ORDER BY task_deadline DESC;
SELECT * FROM reminders ORDER BY is_completed ASC, task_deadline DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM tasks;
SELECT task_name, deadline FROM tasks ORDER BY deadline DESC;
SELECT task_name, deadline FROM tasks WHERE deadline > '2022-01-01';
SELECT task_name, deadline FROM tasks WHERE task_name LIKE 'Important%';
SELECT t.task_name, n.notification_message FROM tasks t JOIN notifications n ON t.id = n.task_id;
SELECT id, task_name, deadline FROM tasks WHERE deadline < '2023-01-01' ORDER BY deadline DESC;
SELECT task_name, notification_message FROM tasks JOIN notifications ON tasks.id = notifications.task_id WHERE notifications.id > 10;
SELECT * FROM tasks WHERE task_name LIKE '%important%';
SELECT id, task_name, deadline FROM tasks WHERE deadline BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31' ORDER BY task_name ASC;
SELECT task_name, COUNT(*) AS notification_count FROM tasks JOIN notifications ON tasks.id = notifications.task_id GROUP BY task_name HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
SELECT * FROM notifications;
SELECT message, deadline FROM notifications WHERE id = 1;
SELECT task_name, deadline FROM tasks WHERE is_completed = TRUE;
SELECT username, email FROM users ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT task_description, deadline FROM tasks WHERE task_name LIKE '%important%';
SELECT * FROM notifications WHERE deadline > NOW() ORDER BY deadline DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT message, deadline FROM notifications WHERE id IN (1, 3, 5)
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE phone_number LIKE '%555%' ORDER BY username ASC
SELECT task_name, is_completed FROM tasks WHERE deadline < '2022-12-31'
SELECT user_id, username, email, phone_number FROM users WHERE user_id > 100
SELECT * FROM reminders WHERE is_completed=true;
SELECT task_description, deadline FROM reminders WHERE deadline < '2022-01-01';
SELECT reminder_id, task_description FROM reminders WHERE deadline > '2022-06-30' ORDER BY deadline DESC;
SELECT * FROM reminders WHERE task_description LIKE '%important%';
SELECT reminder_id, deadline FROM reminders WHERE is_completed=false ORDER BY deadline ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM reminders WHERE deadline > NOW() AND is_completed = false ORDER BY deadline DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT task_description, deadline FROM reminders WHERE is_completed = true ORDER BY deadline ASC
SELECT reminder_id, task_description, is_completed FROM reminders WHERE task_description LIKE '%urgent%' ORDER BY is_completed DESC
SELECT task_description FROM reminders WHERE is_completed = false AND deadline < '2023-01-01'
SELECT * FROM reminders WHERE task_description ILIKE 'meeting%'
SELECT * FROM reminders ORDER BY deadline_date DESC;
SELECT task_name, deadline_date FROM tasks WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT reminder_id, task_name, deadline_date FROM reminders WHERE deadline_date >= '2023-01-01';
SELECT * FROM users WHERE username = 'john_doe';
SELECT * FROM notifications ORDER BY notification_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM reminders WHERE deadline_date >= '2022-09-20';
SELECT task_name, deadline_date FROM tasks WHERE user_id = 1 ORDER BY deadline_date DESC;
SELECT r.reminder_id, r.task_name, u.username FROM reminders r JOIN users u ON r.reminder_id = u.user_id;
SELECT t.task_name, n.notification_date FROM tasks t JOIN notifications n ON t.task_id = n.notification_id WHERE n.notification_date > '2022-09-15';
SELECT th.reminder_id, th.action, th.action_date, r.task_name FROM reminders_history th JOIN reminders r ON th.reminder_id = r.reminder_id ORDER BY th.action_date ASC;
